archimate:Requirement.name: SM.2.1.7: Information security practitioners should demonstrate their experience and knowledge of information security by obtaining and maintaining industry-accepted, professional security certifications, such as those provided by (ISC)2, ISACA, CIISec, ISSA, SANS and the Cloud Security Alliance.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
